description: Don't wait in endless lines to play-Killer Instinct comes to Super NES with action graphics and sound that annihilates all other combat games! Fulgore Jago B.Orchid Spinal and all your favorite warriors contend in the Ultratech KI Combo Theory of connected moves and finishing tactics to destroy their opponents. With incredible displays of eyelasers ice lances wind kicks and laser blades these fearless fighters prove their battle prowess. But remember if you lose it's hero to zero!
